content: knitted blanket with cables for baby pattern no bm-089 measurements width approx 40-65 cm/15¾ -25½ height approx 50-80 cm/19¾ -31½ materials drops babymerino from garnstudio yarn group a 250-350 g color 23 light beige drops circular needle 60 or 80 cm size 3 mm or size needed to get 24 stitches and 32 row in stocking stitch = width 10 cm and 10 cm vertically drops cable needle - for cables
